trans-unit.source: Associates activities together in a correlation by representing a particular shared <xref href="System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey"></xref> or transient context in the workflow.

[!INCLUDE[wf](~/add/includes/wf-md.md)] provides four types of correlation: [Content Based](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Request-Reply](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Durable Duplex](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Context Exchange](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

[!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] correlation, see [Correlation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), the specific correlation types mentioned previously, and the correlation samples located in the [Services [WF Samples]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) node of the [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/add/includes/wf1-md.md)] samples.

The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> class.
Registers the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> with the workflow runtime.
Unregisters the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle"></xref> with the workflow runtime.
